thread.title: Fox Nears Deal to Buy Group of Local Stations From Sinclair

author: Keach Hagey
title: Fox Nears Deal to Buy Group of Local Stations From Sinclair

organizations.name: fox nears deal to buy group of local stations from sinclair 21st century fox

text:
21st Century Fox is nearing a deal to buy about 10 television stations that Sinclair Broadcast Group is shedding as it seeks regulatory approval for its purchase of Tribune Media, according to people familiar with the matter.
The transaction comes as Fox prepares to sell the bulk of its assets to Walt Disney Co., leaving behind a new Fox focused on broadcast television, live news and sports.
